com.shelbot.windows

Class BlocksCategoryWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shelbot.utils.Section
      • com.shelbot.windows.BlocksCategoryWindow

  • public class BlocksCategoryWindow
extends Section
    Represents the blocks category window on the left most corner. Used to switch view of the Block Drawer
